original_title: The Fab 3: A Gay XXX Parody
overview: Collectively known as the Fab 3, Diego Sans, Paul Canon, and Sean Zevran are on a mission to bring out every guy's best self, and today their target is scruffy, redheaded landscape gardener Calhoun Sawyer. Calhoun's friends say he has a stick up his ass, and he could definitely use some help with his look, so grooming expert Diego Sans leaps into action. The Fab 3 continue their total lifestyle makeover of landscape gardener Calhoun Sawyer as food expert Paul Canon addresses the truly sad state of Calhoun's kitchen.  The only thing gardener Calhoun Sawyer does on his days off is play video games for hours, so the Fab 3's culture expert, Sean Zevran, wants to encourage the Southern charmer to discover a new hobby or passion that could help him to blossom.
title: The Fab 3: A Gay XXX Parody
